services.label: Excavation & Groundworks
services.description: Site preparation and clearance for new builds, extensions, and landscaping projects.

blocks.title: How easy is access for machinery?
Approximate area to prepare or clear
Do you require levelling or compacting after clearance?
Any known underground services (gas, water, electric, etc.)?
Do you have any drawings, photos, or plans?

services.promptTemplate: Create a detailed excavation and groundworks job posting for a project located in {{job_location}}. Highlight the access conditions ({{machinery_access}}), area size ({{area_size}}), materials to clear ({{materials_to_clear}}), ground condition ({{ground_condition}}), and project purpose ({{work_purpose}}). Mention levelling needs ({{levelling_needed}}), waste disposal responsibility ({{waste_disposal}}), known underground services ({{underground_services}}), required machinery ({{machinery_needs}}), preferred start time ({{start_time}}), and whether drawings are available ({{project_assets}}).

services.label: Earthworks & Excavation
services.description: Bulk earthmoving, excavation, and material removal services.
services.promptTemplate: Draft an earthworks and excavation job brief that notes site access ({{site_access}}), excavation area ({{excavation_area}}), depth ({{depth_required}}), materials to remove ({{material_to_remove}}), purpose ({{excavation_purpose}}), disposal plan ({{disposal_method}}), ground condition ({{ground_state}}), machinery ({{required_machinery}}), nearby services ({{services_nearby}}), and start date ({{start_date}}).

services.label: Septic & Water Tank Installation
services.description: Supply and installation of septic, water storage, and soakaway tanks.
services.promptTemplate: Write a septic or water tank installation brief detailing the tank type ({{tank_type}}), capacity ({{tank_capacity}}), ground conditions ({{tank_ground_type}}), excavation depth ({{excavation_depth}}), site access ({{tank_access}}), connection needs ({{disposal_connection}}), backfill ({{backfill_material}}), supply responsibility ({{tank_supply}}), testing requirements ({{tank_testing}}), and start date ({{tank_start}}).

services.label: Ground Beams & Reinforced Slabs
services.description: Structural concrete ground beams and slab pours with reinforcement and formwork.
services.promptTemplate: Craft a ground beam or reinforced slab project summary covering structure type ({{structure_type}}), size ({{slab_size}}), drawing status ({{design_drawings}}), reinforcement ({{reinforcement_required}}), concrete type ({{concrete_type}}), formwork needs ({{formwork_required}}), delivery access ({{delivery_access}}), ground condition ({{ground_condition}}), waste handling ({{slab_waste}}), and timeline ({{slab_timeline}}).

services.label: Concrete Block Walls
services.description: Construction of structural and decorative concrete block walls.
services.promptTemplate: Describe a concrete block wall project including the purpose ({{wall_purpose}}), length ({{wall_length}}), height ({{wall_height}}), block type ({{block_type}}), finish ({{wall_finish}}), footing needs ({{footings_required}}), reinforcement ({{wall_reinforcement}}), site access ({{material_access}}), waste plan ({{wall_waste}}), and timeframe ({{wall_timeline}}).

services.label: Brickwork & Cavity Walls
services.description: Bricklaying for new builds, extensions, boundary walls, and repairs.
services.promptTemplate: Generate a brickwork and cavity wall brief covering work type ({{work_type}}), brick type ({{brick_type}}), cavity configuration ({{cavity_wall}}), wall size ({{wall_size}}), bond pattern ({{bond_pattern}}), mortar colour ({{mortar_colour}}), pointing style ({{pointing_style}}), access ({{access_requirements}}), and material supply ({{material_supply}}).

services.label: Natural Stone Masonry
services.description: Stone walling, cladding, and retaining structures using natural stone.
services.promptTemplate: Outline a natural stone masonry project covering stone type ({{stone_type}}), format ({{stone_format}}), purpose ({{stone_purpose}}), wall height ({{stone_wall_height}}), mortar finish ({{mortar_finish}}), foundation needs ({{stone_foundation}}), drainage ({{stone_drainage}}), supply responsibility ({{stone_supply}}), access ({{stone_access}}), and start timeframe ({{stone_timeline}}).

services.label: Retaining Walls (Concrete, Stone, Gabion)
services.description: Design and construction of retaining walls for landscaping and structural support.
services.promptTemplate: Summarize a retaining wall project detailing wall type ({{retaining_type}}), purpose ({{retaining_purpose}}), length ({{wall_length}}), height ({{wall_height}}), footing needs ({{retaining_footings}}), drainage ({{retaining_drainage}}), reinforcement ({{retaining_reinforcement}}), finish ({{retaining_finish}}), site access ({{site_access}}), and start timeframe ({{retaining_timeline}}).

services.label: Load-Bearing Partitions
services.description: Construction of structural partition walls in renovations, extensions, and commercial spaces.
services.promptTemplate: Compose a load-bearing partition project brief describing structure type ({{structure_type}}), material ({{partition_material}}), thickness ({{wall_thickness}}), height ({{wall_height}}), reinforcement ({{partition_reinforcement}}), finish ({{partition_finish}}), openings ({{openings}}), access ({{access_conditions}}), drawings ({{partition_drawings}}), and start timeframe ({{partition_timeline}}).

services.label: Rendered & Decorative Walls
services.description: Rendering and decorative finishes for interior and exterior walls.
services.promptTemplate: Create a rendered or decorative wall brief covering surface type ({{surface_type}}), purpose ({{render_purpose}}), finish ({{finish_type}}), system ({{render_system}}), colour ({{colour_preference}}), area ({{area_size}}), surface condition ({{surface_condition}}), access ({{render_access}}), material supply ({{render_materials}}), and timeline ({{render_timeline}}).

services.label: Pointing & Joint Finishing
services.description: Repointing, joint finishing, and restoration for brick, block, and stone walls.
services.promptTemplate: INCOMPLETE - Needs blocks 8-10 and final promptTemplate
